blogs.title: That rotten curly head didn't pay us again!
blogs.body: Gin-san being stupid, gamble all of our hard earned money into pachinko again! I have to stop Otose-san from murdering him. He should be grateful, that bastard!
blogs.author: Shimura Shinpachi

blogs.title: Stupid Gin-chan
blogs.body: He drained all of our money in gambling. I went out in anger because he wasn't giving any food to the fair maiden. But when I came back next day, I saw icecreams in the refrigerator, his hand was plastered, laying down like an useless old man. That stupid Gin-chan...
blogs.author: Kabukichou's Queen Kagura

blogs.title: I need sugar, damn it!
blogs.body: It's valentine's day and thanks to the stupid author, I am not getting any chocolate! Come on, poor Gin-san needs his daily dose of sugar, I don't need any love. Please someone, give me some CHOCOLATE!
blogs.author: Sakata Gintoki

blogs.title: Forgive me...
blogs.body: I know you're worried about me Otae, but I can't continue to sit on my ass and my kids get killed by that sick bastard. I will have to go. Thanks a bunch.
blogs.author: Sakata Gintoki

blogs.title: Lost again.....
blogs.body: I lost again in pachinko parlor.... Ahh, if only I had stopped when I won for the first time, I still would've left money for a chocolate parfait! If only.....
blogs.author: Sakata Gintoki
